snippet: After a first-quarter slump, some economists expected more help from Britain’s central bank.
abstract: Bank of England keeps its benchmark interest rate unchanged at a record low of 0.5 percent, as the British economy struggles to recover amid the government's austerity program and troubles in the euro zone.
lead_paragraph: After a first-quarter slump, some economists expected more help from Britain’s central bank.

headline.seo: Bank of England Maintains Interest Rate and Stimulus Program
headline.main: Bank of England Maintains Interest Rate and Stimulus Program
headline.print_headline: Bank of England Keeps Interest Rate at Record Low
